EmailTemplate.description: Use this form to send a shipment request to BK Shipping for a replacement xVue
EmailTemplate.name: xVue Shipment Request
EmailTemplate.subject: xVue Shipment Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Robert,
Please ship the identified xVue part number listed below per these instructions. Can you please include a prepaid return label with this shipment? Also, please let us know how many of this part number we have left in stock.
Shipping Information Required to complete Pack List:
Customer Name Customer Address Customer Phone Number Quantity: 1 BK ID Number: (what is this?) Description: xVue Touch Value: $0.00 Part Number: Serial Number: (completed by shipping) Notes: "Please include prepaid return label for failed unit"
Shipping Information Required to complete Export Form:
Manufacturer Name (Plexus) Model Number: xVue Serial Number: (should be filled in by shipping) Part Number: Equipment Description: xVue Touch Display Quantity: 1 Actual Cost in $: Customer Name Customer Address ECCN HEC TEC
Thank you,
